name: perfluoropentane production | perfluoropentane | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4054/documentation

This is a proxy dataset for the production of perfluoropentane (C5F12). Perfluoropentane is used e.g. in medicinal processes and as a working fluid e.g. in an organic rankine cycle unit. This dataset has a high uncertainty and has to be set up from scratch for better quality.

This dataset is a first proxy for the production of perfluoropentane, but has to be revised by specialists.

This dataset doesn't include any specifications, but only a proxy chemical as input.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

exchanges.description: Proxy - This input is only a proxy for the whole production process of perfluoropentane.
